mapper.select: SELECT employee_no,department_name, d.department_no as department_no, position, employee_name from employee e left join department d on e.department_no = d.department_no
select e.*, department_name from employee e left join department d on e.department_no = d.department_no where employee_no = #{employee_no} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: update employee set last_login = sysdate where employee_no = #{employee_no}
mapper.select: SELECT gen_date as work_date, employee_no, attendance_time, leave_time, dayoff_name, days, oneorhalf FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{attendance_time}) + LEVEL - 1, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS GEN_DATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(#{leave_time}) - TO_DATE(#{attendance_time}) + 1)) LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM work_recode WHERE employee_no=#{employee_no}) wr on gen_date = work_date LEFT JOIN (SELECT dayoff_name, dad.* FROM dayoff_apply da JOIN dayoff_apply_detail dad ON da.dayoff_no=dad.dayoff_no join dayoff_kinds dk on da.dayoff_type_code = dk.dayoff_type_code join DOCUMENT d on d.document_no = da.document_no WHERE document_state != '3' and document_state !='4' and employee_no =#{employee_no}) on gen_date = TO_CHAR(DAYOFF_DAY,'yyyy-MM-dd') order by GEN_DATE asc
